Code flows like water
Through circuits of silicon
Logic finds its peace

Debugging at dawn
Errors dissolve in stillness
Clarity emerges

Functions call softly
Recursion mirrors the soul
Infinite returns

Variables change
Yet constants remain steadfast
Balance in the code

Compile errors teach
Patience in the face of bugs
Wisdom through failure

Algorithms dance
In patterns beyond our sight
Order from chaos

Memory leaks flow
Like thoughts we cannot capture
Release and let go

Syntax errors speak
Of imperfection's beauty
Growth through correction

Loops iterate life
Each cycle brings understanding
Progress through repeat

Comments guide the way
For future selves to follow
Kindness to tomorrow
